content.title: Create a Component
content.body:
1. From the upper-left corner of Iris, go to the Templates explorer.
  2. Right-click on Components and select New > with Contract.
  3. Enter the following details:
    • Namespace: userEntry
    • Name: emailField
  4. Click OK.
  5. An emailField flex container is created by default. From the Templates explorer, expand Components > userEntry.emailField and select the emailField flex container.
  6. From the Properties panel, click Look.
  7. Under the Flex section, modify the values of the following properties:
    • Top: 190 Dp
    • Height: 30 %
    • Width: 100 %
